verses.verse: בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> On that night הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נָדְדָ֖ה <S%H5074><s%> could not שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8142><s%> sleep הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he commanded לְהָבִ֞יא <S%H935><s%> to bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סֵ֤פֶר <S%H5612><s%> the book הַזִּכְרֹנוֹת֙ <S%H2146><s%> of records דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> act הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> age וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become נִקְרָאִ֖ים <S%H7121><s%> and they were read לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַיִּמָּצֵ֣א <S%H4672><s%> And it was found כָת֗וּב <S%H3789><s%> written אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> what הִגִּ֨יד <S%H5046><s%> had told מָרְדֳּכַ֜י <S%H4782><s%> that Mordecai עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning בִּגְתָ֣נָא <S%H904><s%> of Bigthana וָתֶ֗רֶשׁ <S%H8657><s%> and Teresh שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> two סָרִיסֵ֣י <S%H5631><s%> chamberlains הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's מִשֹּׁמְרֵ֖י <S%H8104><s%> the keepers הַסַּ֑ף <S%H5592><s%> of the door אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> what בִּקְשׁוּ֙ <S%H1245><s%> who sought לִשְׁלֹ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> to lay יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> hand בַּמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> on the king אֲחַשְׁוֵרֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נַּעֲשָׂ֞ה <S%H6213><s%> hath been done יְקָ֧ר <S%H3366><s%> What honour וּגְדוּלָּ֛ה <S%H1420><s%> and dignity לְמָרְדֳּכַ֖י <S%H4782><s%> to Mordecai עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and זֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> him וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> for this? Then said נַעֲרֵ֤י <S%H5288><s%> servants הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king's מְשָׁ֣רְתָ֔יו <S%H8334><s%> that ministered לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נַעֲשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> done עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> There דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> unto him There is nothing

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who בֶחָצֵ֑ר <S%H2691><s%> court וְהָמָ֣ן <S%H2001><s%> Haman בָּ֗א <S%H935><s%> was come לַחֲצַ֤ר <S%H2691><s%> court בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's הַחִ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <S%H2435><s%> into the outward לֵאמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> to speak לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king לִתְלוֹת֙ <S%H8518><s%> to hang אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מָרְדֳּכַ֔י <S%H4782><s%> Mordecai עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָעֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> on the gallows אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֵכִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> that he had prepared לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> said נַעֲרֵ֤י <S%H5288><s%> servants הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> And the king's אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הָמָ֖ן <S%H2001><s%> unto him Behold Haman עֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> standeth בֶּחָצֵ֑ר <S%H2691><s%> in the court וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> Let him come in

וַיָּבוֹא֮ <S%H935><s%> came in הָמָן֒ <S%H2001><s%> So Haman וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <S%H6213><s%> unto him What shall be done בָּאִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> whom the king חָפֵ֣ץ <S%H2654><s%> delighteth בִּיקָר֑וֹ <S%H3366><s%> honour וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> thought הָמָן֙ <S%H2001><s%> Haman בְּלִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart לְמִ֞י <S%H4310><s%> Whom יַחְפֹּ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> delight הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> To whom would the king לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do יְקָ֖ר <S%H3366><s%> to honor יוֹתֵ֥ר <S%H3148><s%> more מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> than

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered הָמָ֖ן <S%H2001><s%> And Haman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> For the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> whom the king חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> delighteth בִּיקָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H3366><s%> to honour

יָבִ֙יאוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> be brought לְב֣וּשׁ <S%H3830><s%> apparel מַלְכ֔וּת <S%H4438><s%> Let the royal אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לָֽבַשׁ־ <S%H3847><s%> [useth] to wear בּ֖וֹ הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> which the king וְס֗וּס <S%H5483><s%> and the horse אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which רָכַ֤ב <S%H7392><s%> rideth עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> that the king וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose נִתַּ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> which is set כֶּ֥תֶר <S%H3804><s%> upon and the crown מַלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> royal בְּרֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head

וְנָת֨וֹן <S%H5414><s%> be delivered הַלְּב֜וּשׁ <S%H3830><s%> And let this apparel וְהַסּ֗וּס <S%H5483><s%> and horse עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> to the hand אִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of one מִשָּׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> princes הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's הַֽפַּרְתְּמִ֔ים <S%H6579><s%> most noble וְהִלְבִּ֙ישׁוּ֙ <S%H3847><s%> that they may array אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [withal] whom the king חָפֵ֣ץ <S%H2654><s%> delighteth בִּֽיקָר֑וֹ <S%H3366><s%> to honour וְהִרְכִּיבֻ֤הוּ <S%H7392><s%> and bring עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַסּוּס֙ <S%H5483><s%> him on horseback בִּרְח֣וֹב <S%H7339><s%> through the street הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וְקָרְא֣וּ <S%H7121><s%> and proclaim לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> before כָּ֚כָה <S%H3602><s%> Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> him Thus shall it be done לָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> whom the king חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> delighteth בִּיקָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H3366><s%> to honour

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king לְהָמָ֗ן <S%H2001><s%> to Haman מַ֠הֵר <S%H4116><s%> Make haste קַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> [and] take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְּב֤וּשׁ <S%H3830><s%> the apparel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסּוּס֙ <S%H5483><s%> and the horse כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you דִּבַּ֔רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> as thou hast said וַֽעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and do כֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> so לְמָרְדֳּכַ֣י <S%H4782><s%> even so to Mordecai הַיְּהוּדִ֔י <S%H3064><s%> the Jew הַיּוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> that sitteth בְּשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> at the king's אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּפֵּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> fail דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> let nothing מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> of all that thou hast spoken

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> Then took הָמָן֙ <S%H2001><s%> Haman אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְּב֣וּשׁ <S%H3830><s%> the apparel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסּ֔וּס <S%H5483><s%> and the horse וַיַּלְבֵּ֖שׁ <S%H3847><s%> and arrayed אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מָרְדֳּכָ֑י <S%H4782><s%> Mordecai וַיַּרְכִּיבֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7392><s%> and brought him on horseback בִּרְח֣וֹב <S%H7339><s%> through the street הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> and proclaimed לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> before כָּ֚כָה <S%H3602><s%> Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> him Thus shall it be done לָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> whom the king חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> delighteth בִּיקָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H3366><s%> to honour

וַיָּ֥שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> came again מָרְדֳּכַ֖י <S%H4782><s%> And Mordecai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king's וְהָמָן֙ <S%H2001><s%> But Haman נִדְחַ֣ף <S%H1765><s%> hasted אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> to his house אָבֵ֖ל <S%H57><s%> mourning וַחֲפ֥וּי <S%H2645><s%> covered רֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> and having his head

וַיְסַפֵּ֨ר <S%H5608><s%> told הָמָ֜ן <S%H2001><s%> And Haman לְזֶ֤רֶשׁ <S%H2238><s%> Zeresh אִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <S%H802><s%> his wife וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֹ֣הֲבָ֔יו <S%H157><s%> and all his friends אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom קָרָ֑הוּ <S%H7136><s%> every [thing] that had befallen וַיֹּ֩אמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> him Then said ל֨וֹ חֲכָמָ֜יו <S%H2450><s%> his wise men וְזֶ֣רֶשׁ <S%H2238><s%> and Zeresh אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife אִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> If מִזֶּ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> [be] of the seed הַיְּהוּדִ֡ים <S%H3064><s%> of the Jews מָרְדֳּכַ֞י <S%H4782><s%> unto him If Mordecai אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whom הַחִלּ֨וֹתָ <S%H2490><s%> whom thou hast begun לִנְפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> to fall לְפָנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> before לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> you will not תוּכַ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> thou shalt not prevail ל֔וֹ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> but נָפ֥וֹל <S%H5307><s%> against him but shalt surely תִּפּ֖וֹל <S%H5307><s%> fall לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

עוֹדָם֙ <S%H5750><s%> were still מְדַבְּרִ֣ים <S%H1696><s%> And while they [were] yet talking עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וְסָרִיסֵ֥י <S%H5631><s%> chamberlains הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's הִגִּ֑יעוּ <S%H5060><s%> with him came וַיַּבְהִ֙לוּ֙ <S%H926><s%> and hasted לְהָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> to bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָמָ֔ן <S%H2001><s%> Haman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֖ה <S%H4960><s%> unto the banquet אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשְׂתָ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> had prepared אֶסְתֵּֽר׃ <S%H635><s%> that Esther
